short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The best way to exploit ads space. Choice what you want to see instead of ads.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Inforness - Replace Ads to fun & interesting content!

This Extension do your browsing more fun and interesting. The Extension try to replace Ads(Advertising) to nice images, fun quotes, motivation slogans, updates for your interesting topics or custom feed channels that allow you to learn new things such English words.
